main event: Observers reported a lighted white and red light at approximately 45 deg elevation moving slowly, changing color, and blinking out.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 35 seconds., The object was described as having no shape, just a light., The size of the light was compared to that of vehicle headlights., The object moved south, then north before appearing to go out., Investigating officer concluded that the object was likely vehicle lights causing optical phenomena.
